'''Wings of the Starlit Feast''' is a [[Wind Glider]] obtainable through a redemption code obtained by buying a specific [[Genshin Impact x Pizza Hut|Pizza Hut]] combo meal in China. It is available globally through participation [[Prime Gaming/2022-12-14|Genshin Impact x Prime Gaming]] event by redeeming 4 or more bundles.
